website_summaries.verdict: Not ideal for coloring books, but artists should enjoy experimenting with these wrapper-free blocks of pigmented beeswax.
pros: Unwrapped block-shaped crayons allow for different techniques
Opaque colors produce a watercolor-like result
cons: Lack of protective paper may cause cross-contamination of colors

customer_reviews.title: Note the size
customer_reviews.text: They are cute, colorful, highly pigmented beeswax crayons--and they are tiny. I bought for stone rubbing, but will need to find something larger for my needs. I will keep these cuties to draw with, though!
customer_reviews.author: A. Liv

customer_reviews.title: These are wonderful! A little smaller than I imagined when I ...
customer_reviews.text: These are wonderful! A little smaller than I imagined when I purchased them, but realize now that I am thankful they can fit nicely in any container for homeschool supplies! AND they work amazing for my kiddos! Get on youtube and search how to use block crayons and you will be so excited, even as a parent to try out the different techniques! They will most likely last a long time, but I will purchase again when the time comes. My kids are ALL about practicing the baby bear, Momma bear, and Papa besr sides. :) So far we have LOVED these in our homeschool!
customer_reviews.author: Kristy Jo

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money!!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in used condition! It has a nazi symbol carving on the crayon. How bad is that!!!! Unbelievable!!
customer_reviews.author: OMFS

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited to give these crayons a try. We go through regular crayons way too fast, and I’ve heard that these very rarely break. Unfortunately, one of ours arrived broken. The colors are beautiful and my kids seem to love them so far, I just don’t think they’re the quality I was looking for. Very expensive for what you get. The crayons are also much smaller than what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle R

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing! The same as my son has at his school (Waldorf school), and he absolutely loves them. Draws with them every day. They are so smooth and the pigment is amazing! Will be purchasing the 16 count box for Christmas!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Marie Cantey

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for creating sweeping lines of color, but they are only 10% beeswax
customer_reviews.text: These beeswax color blocks are great for older kids or adults who want to create sweeping lines of color. They are probably less appropriate for little toddler and pre-schooler's hands, and they are NOT safe for them because they are NOT 100% BEESWAX. All the Stockmar Beeswax art crayons are really excellent for laying down color on paper. But be advised, they are only 10% beeswax. I think that Stockmar should be required to be much more clear on their lables that their crayons are only a small percentage of beeswax
customer_reviews.author: Theodora Di Passional

customer_reviews.title: Great Crayons
customer_reviews.text: I love these crayons, theyre a big rectangular shape which is good for little hands, especially ones who cry when they're pointed ends break off of regular crayons. So yeah he's four, but after using these I called my brother who is an an (adult) artist and told him he needed these! They're bright and vibrant and smooth. Really recommend these to anyone of any age.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Not the best toddler crayons...
customer_reviews.text: They're good but not great. I thought I would prefer this form factor for my 15mo old but while he can't eat them, you also seem to have to push harder b/c they're much waxier than crayola. And until they round a bit, they don't produce much color. The lack of paper wrapping means that the yellow and orange incorporate the colors of whatever you put them next to.
customer_reviews.author: HARviews

customer_reviews.title: Hendrix was looking upon us with approval me thinks.
customer_reviews.text: Used for memorial stone rubbing at the Jimi Hendrix Memorial in Renton, WA. Purple came in handy! Worked great. Did his signature in ROYGBIV rainbow colors.
customer_reviews.author: J Michael

customer_reviews.title: Love these !
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter’s first crayons. My nephew has them and I know how durable they are. And I love the fact that they are beeswax since she took a nibble at the corner of two so far. I think we have an artist here.
customer_reviews.author: Ms.AK

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: My 18 month old loves these! Super easy for her to hold and great pigmentation. She's not a huge fan of the texture but she's weird with textures anyways. Love that they are safe because she also likes to put them in her mouth. Would purchase again and recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany C.

customer_reviews.title: My 2 year old loves them and they don’t break
customer_reviews.text: My kid loves these. Bright colors, easy to hold and non toxic. They don’t break- my kid is 2- so the square chunky blocks are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: CT

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel
customer_reviews.text: Love the shape and the case the crayons come in. They are perfect for our upcoming trip. They won’t take up a lot of space in our luggage.
customer_reviews.author: Amy M.

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: They worked great for a stone rubbing I was doing of someone’s name on a sidewalk.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: 7 stars!!!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't think crayons could be so great - BUT these are nice - nice to smell, nice to touch, nice color You can use the corners for detail or turn flat for a young child and show them how to achieve a rainbow with a simple swish across the page. I prefer the sticks to the blocks, but I'm glad I have both. These do not wear down quickly and we will not have to replace them for 20 years!
customer_reviews.author: Mama Magee

customer_reviews.title: Used!
customer_reviews.text: The crayons arrived with some missing, some broken, and all clearly used.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Barak

customer_reviews.title: Perfect First Crayon Set
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for my 1.5 year old's hands and she LOVES them. They draw so easily and smoothly with light pressure, and they are easy for her to grab and scribble with. She doesn't chew on things much anymore but I don't worry if she puts these in her mouth. We had been working on colors before I got these, but now she seems excited to learn colors when combined with drawing. When these run out, I'll be purchasing more!
customer_reviews.author: Heather K

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic coverage and color
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE these crayons and will definitely be ordering more. I am a professional artist and I am blown away by the quality and vibrant colors. A must add for for your toolbox :)
customer_reviews.author: S. Miles

customer_reviews.title: Add more design for your child's artwork with these
customer_reviews.text: It's a great option for younger kids to start coloring and can easily transition to the more common crayons. It provides more creativity due to the different sides and edges the block crayon provides.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Manez

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use...but saving for when she is older.
customer_reviews.text: These are gorgeous crayons, and like previous reviewers have mentioned, it does not take a lot of pressure for little hands to use them. The downside of that is that they get all over EVERYTHING. I'm going to save these for when my 1-year-old has a little more control and stick with P'Kolino's Extra Jumbo Triangular Crayons for now.
customer_reviews.author: E.M.S.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: These crayons have great color and do not create the chalky pieces that other crayons do. I love how easily you can color on a sheet of paper. I got these for my 12 month old and she still isn't at the stage of "drawing" but they fit her hands nicely so hopefully in a few months she'll start using them.
customer_reviews.author: BNDN

customer_reviews.title: Nice present for kids
customer_reviews.text: The crayons and the box are much smaller than they seemed to be in the pictured. Besides that, they are great! My kid loves them as she can color backgrounds faster and they are easy to handle. It’s a great present option!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great color- long lasting and unbrakable!
customer_reviews.text: I was glad to find these...allows real color blending and safety for our grandson.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Britton Seyler

customer_reviews.title: So nice.
customer_reviews.text: These crayons are so nice. The color goes on so smooth, and they have a great feel to them. They smell awesome as well. They are the perfect size for my 20 month old. You could easily melt down some regular old crayons to make the same square shape, but then that kind of takes away from my main motive for purchase.. the more environmentally friendly and healthier aspect. My daughter thinks that they are great, and mom approves!
customer_reviews.author: vintagek

customer_reviews.title: Best Crayons ever
customer_reviews.text: Best Crayons ever! I always buy a set at birthdays and holidays for the younger members of the family. Colors are brilliant and effortlessly transfer to paper. The tin keeps them contained and protected for the life of the product. I have been using these for about 18 years and would never go back to crayola.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Schubert-Fair

customer_reviews.title: Not real
customer_reviews.text: I have stockmar crayons for years that never broke. We received these with two missing and also the remainders broke within a week of use. I believe they aren’t real stockmar. My children use these in school and maybe one breaks every few years if that!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and very original
customer_reviews.text: Would buy these again and again! Excellent quality and very original.
customer_reviews.author: ConsciousBuyer

customer_reviews.title: Not a first crayon
customer_reviews.text: After reading good things about these, I was looking for a toddler crayon. Bummed that my 17 month old isn't into these. They look great, and he doesn't like the taste of them, but he's unsure of how to work these. Even when I model them, he just doesn't get it. Saving these for when he's older.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse's mom

customer_reviews.title: Rich colors all over the page
customer_reviews.text: I bought these block crayons for children aged 5 and 7. The colors are beautiful, and the shape of the crayons allows large areas like oceans, sky, hills, sand dunes or the whole moon to be colored fairly evenly in a fraction of the time regular crayons would take. The children absolutely LOVE this, and enjoy making drawings so much more. We'll definitely replace these if they ever wear out!
customer_reviews.author: Wanner

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for toddlers
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to clean off of walls, table and floors. Great size makes them less desirable for little ones to try to chew. Great knowing they are made with care in case they do get ingested.
customer_reviews.author: S. J. West

customer_reviews.title: Amazing pigment.
customer_reviews.text: These just feel nice to the touch. My 4 year old loves them and they are beautifully pigmented
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Wood

customer_reviews.title: smaller than expected but nice
customer_reviews.text: thought these blocks for the price would be a little bigger, they are only an inch by inch and a half (approx).. i used a few with my toddler, and they dont look like they will last long eighter... but beeswax is safest for those who still like to eat there toys in that split second... wouldn't buy again when she has more control
customer_reviews.author: SAHMNYC

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Great crayons! I got these for my son who is 17 mths old so I wouldn't worry so much about him putting them in his mouth for a sec and I like that they are square and he can hold it at any angle to color. They smell good & the colors are very vibrant. I would recommend for anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Niners

customer_reviews.title: GREAT toddler crayons!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter LOVES these crayons. The case is great! She carries around more than just the crayons in the case. The colors are simple and easily learnable. They also are easily gripped by a toddler's hands. She makes masterpieces daily as a 2 yo! :)
customer_reviews.author: Evie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: These crayons were much, much smaller than I anticipated upon opening the tin holder. However, the color and ease of use of them makes the product worth it for us! Easy to hold, difficult to break. It's worth the money, and I'll likely purchase a larger set in time.
customer_reviews.author: K. Beal

customer_reviews.title: Horrible packaging
customer_reviews.text: Nice crayons, but arrived open, with the crayons spilled out into the cardboard box, and the inside of the box covered in crayon markings from them being jostled around. They arrived scuffed and damaged. Should have been taped shut
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Goldstein

customer_reviews.title: Got Fat Toddler Hands?
customer_reviews.text: Made in Germany from non-toxic materials, these fit well in fat toddler hands, and boast of punchy primary colors. I look forward to purchasing more Stockmar art products - they seem like quality and come in a cute, reusable box.
customer_reviews.author: colleen

customer_reviews.title: Bending
customer_reviews.text: I love the ability to blend and layers the colors.
customer_reviews.author: Kath W.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy. They travel well too
customer_reviews.text: These have lasted forever! Years later they're still totally usable. Great buy. They travel well too.
customer_reviews.author: Pantherina

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: They seem to be great but this shape just don't fit to my 19M old son.
customer_reviews.author: Lenka S

customer_reviews.title: Great item, great delivery, just in time!
customer_reviews.text: I fully recommend people with little kids to buy this product. It is safe for them since it is really non-toxic and it is easy for little kids to grab the crayons easily. My kid is having a lot of fun with them! The product arrived on time, even before than expected, without complications. I just wonder if the size of the box and crayons is mentioned somewhere? I expected them to be bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Cesar M. Garcia Murguia

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My little kids love these block crayons, fit great in their hands.
customer_reviews.author: em1113

customer_reviews.title: Nice natural crayon
customer_reviews.text: Really love them, natural material... already had them when I was a child, will always buy them again
customer_reviews.author: Wiebke

customer_reviews.title: How it is so expensive at the end?
customer_reviews.text: How this item became so ridiculous expensive. It costs only 67 shekels and at the end I pay more then 200 shekels? What is this?
customer_reviews.author: Elisheva Dorot

customer_reviews.title: Love these crayons!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best crayons! My daughter just turned two and will still test me by chewing on crayons. At least with these, I know she isn't getting a bunch of chemicals in her mouth. They also come out bright and vibrant on paper.
customer_reviews.author: Devon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They smell so good! My kids love these. I am a Waldorf newbie and we love using these.
customer_reviews.author: Annie Bobannie

customer_reviews.title: Stick crayons delivered not block
customer_reviews.text: These are great except I didn't get the block crayons that I spent more money for I got the regular stick crayons.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A classic Waldorf must-have item.
customer_reviews.text: A classic Waldorf must-have item. My 18 month old daughter loves her blocks and we use them a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: High quality and safe for little ones
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical based on the price, but I couldn't be happier with these crayons. I bought them for my 15 month old who is still in the "taste everything" phase. After a quick taste she realized they were much better for drawing than eating. Her little hands have no problem controlling the bricks and she loves to create masterpieces with these highly pigmented beauties. Mommy has fun coloring with them too. Great crayons if you are trying to avoid toxins found in the more mainstream brands found in the big box stores.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Love these crayons
customer_reviews.text: After my kid had an allergic reaction to Play-Doh (no, it wasn't the wheat) I started looking for more natural products and fewer chemicals and synthetic dyes. My kids adore these crayons, and they draw well with beautiful colors. Very easy for small hands to hold the big chunky shape, although they also come in a stick form for kids who have mastered their pencil grip. These are fantastic, and I would buy them again. Only downside, tin is not well made and the hinges broke within days. There are small metal tabs that hold the lid and bottom together, and they loosen quickly so the top and bottom will come apart and must be put back together.
customer_reviews.author: PT Mama

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and nifty container, won't have to buy crayons for awhile since these haven't broken.
customer_reviews.author: Rhiverwolf

customer_reviews.title: The colors are nice and it's non toxic and vegan
customer_reviews.text: It's safe for younger kids to use it but younger kids are nit that much in drawing. The colors are nice and it's non toxic and vegan.
customer_reviews.author: Sahar

customer_reviews.title: Great crayons, bright colors
customer_reviews.text: I really liked these for my toddler, got them when he was 12 mos, now that he's 2.5 he still uses them. The write very well and he likes to stack the shapes as well.
customer_reviews.author: K. Fox

customer_reviews.title: THE VERY BEST CRAYONS
customer_reviews.text: All the colors we need to begin our Kindergarden Class. Beautiful, rich colors
customer_reviews.author: jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality grey product!
customer_reviews.text: Love these so much! My son lol bed having real looking art supplies like Mama. They work great too great quality!
customer_reviews.author: Let Love Rain

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: The box arrived broken, open and with only 7 crayons?!?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: These seem to require more pressure to make much of a mark than my 1 year old can make. Also, he likes to chew on them so I have to be extremely vigilant when he is holding them. On the other hand, love that they are non-toxic and very easy for him to hold.
customer_reviews.author: Elenita

customer_reviews.title: Perfect toddler crayons!!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves them and husband wants a set for himself.
customer_reviews.author: Adriann Anfiteatro

customer_reviews.title: just right for toddlers and preschoolers
customer_reviews.text: easy to hold and smoothly transfers color to paper. just right for younger kids - no pencil grip required! great
customer_reviews.author: momof4

customer_reviews.title: beautiful colors to create a surface of blending colors, rather than an outline.
customer_reviews.text: I love these colors for their vibrancy of color on the one hand, and on the shape of the crayon that makes it possible to layer colors on top of each other. Also it is easy to create shapes that are formed by a color going from dark to light by merely putting pressure on the corner of the crayon.
customer_reviews.author: Renate Kurth

customer_reviews.title: These are amazing. They work well for my 18 month old
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing. They work well for my 18 month old. They make coloring a bit easier for her.
customer_reviews.author: CRYSTAL MCLAUGHLIN

customer_reviews.title: Good first crayons!
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, easy to grip, nice and bright colors. They seem like a good nontoxic option!
customer_reviews.author: sgs

customer_reviews.title: They are small
customer_reviews.text: Although I did see the size on the page, I am still surprised at how small the package of crayons is. It is about the same size as a 3x5 notecard. I purchased on recommendations of their long-lasting quality, but after just one use I don't think they will last longer than any other normal crayon. Its been awhile since I had a box of normal stick crayons, but I'd gander the box is about the size of a normal 12 count box. The colors are good and easy to lay down. These crayons are a good shape to fit in my child's hand, but they are way too expensive for what you get.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: wonderful quality
customer_reviews.text: the crayons are of an amazing quality- much better than most out there. My daughter loves the shape of them, and their bulk and shape helps prevent breakage. Only reason I didn't give them a 5 is because the shape doesn't allow for coloring small spaces/areas very easily and as they wear down they shape can be a bit awkward. I am going to try them in the more standard shape next time. Very unique though!
customer_reviews.author: Tess Anselm

customer_reviews.title: Durable and safe - perfect for toddlers!
customer_reviews.text: These are extremely durable, lasting crayons that have vibrant colors and are safe even if toddlers knaw on them. I'm delighted to have found this product and see that even know they appear very expensive they cost less overall that "regular" crayons; they will outlast any crayola by years and years, and they are safe in a way that most crayons on the market are not. One set will last for ages (see the other reviewer for more about that).
customer_reviews.author: Sunnyswimmer

customer_reviews.title: Great crayons
customer_reviews.text: These crayon blocks are amazing and very easy for little hands to hold! Love the case and colors. Would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: L. Michelson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Received an EMPTY tin!!!! called an got my money back
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Tovey

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I was ordering as a replacement for our old set.
customer_reviews.author: L. Barcellos

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This product is great for little ones. My daughter (16 months) loves using these crayons. They are easy for her to hold, and they write so smoothly. The tin is wonderful and a great container for keeping these crayons, and it provides a fun activity for my daughter who loves putting things in and out.
customer_reviews.author: CHH

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves them
customer_reviews.text: My 17 month old daughter loves coloring with these. they're not too large for her little hands so she can hold them easily. Just keep them away from the dogs as they are made of beeswax...figured out the hard way
customer_reviews.author: christopher king

customer_reviews.title: They are great!
customer_reviews.text: My 12 month old loves picking these up and scribbling. They are great!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Crittenden

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: After and while coloring my 3 year old stacks them too. We enjoy the beauty of the wide lines one can make.
customer_reviews.author: Marie hall

customer_reviews.title: Our son loves drawing with them, taking them out ...
customer_reviews.text: Our son loves drawing with them, taking them out of the tin box, putting them back into the box and sometimes throwing them. They have survived all so far.
customer_reviews.author: Swanson, Claudia

customer_reviews.title: high quality
customer_reviews.text: continues to be the high quality product its always been. Only change I wish Stockmar would make is to have printed insert be outside the container because the slight chemical smell of the printing lingers on the otherwise sweet pure beeswax scent of the crayons.
customer_reviews.author: lisa mcgregor

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT
customer_reviews.text: I love this product the quality and the company that makes them. All of their products are great. These are wonderful crayons for any age and you can create beautiful artwork with them. Great for your children and you too.
customer_reviews.author: HMRP

customer_reviews.title: Great for little hands
customer_reviews.text: My 18 mo. grandson love to color and these crayons are perfect for little hands. No paper, no broken crayons.
customer_reviews.author: Dogs&Birds

customer_reviews.title: satisfied customer
customer_reviews.text: The items arrived in good condition and are just as they appeared online. I'm am excited for my students to try them out. They arrived on the earliest date that was given to receive them by.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Lind

customer_reviews.title: Very nice crayons
customer_reviews.text: This beeswax crayons are great! High quality! A little bit smaller than what I expected but great for Waldorf inspired drawing and painting!
customer_reviews.author: Coloma Farré

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the crayons but received them loose in the box out of the tin and a little beat up
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting!
customer_reviews.text: We love these crayons. We purchased them about six months ago and they still look like new. We are excited to use them for a long time!
customer_reviews.author: Claire B

customer_reviews.title: Love these crayons!
customer_reviews.text: Just got these Beautiful crayons - rewarding for little hands that don't press hard on paper! Bright vibrant colours! Perfect for little ones!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: age appropriate
customer_reviews.text: information about the age appropriate is not clearly marked,until the order is placed,product is great but can not be used for children under the age of 3
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... purchased) now 4 and 2 year old kids would love these but they reach for the regular crayons first ...
customer_reviews.text: I thought my (3 and 1 when I purchased) now 4 and 2 year old kids would love these but they reach for the regular crayons first every time. Go figure.
customer_reviews.author: HappyMommy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality, and they smell good too!
customer_reviews.text: These are the first crayons I have bought for my 14-month-old. Bought them based on others' reviews and have not been disappointed. They smell like honey from the beeswax, which I love. And they can be used from any angle, which my daughter appreciates. Vivid colors. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: S. Moss

customer_reviews.title: Not for toddlers
customer_reviews.text: I love the idea of these but they are expensive.Theyare fun to use the different edges to make different designs! My 2.5 year old doesn't play with them often and we have lost 2. But the purpose is to get more natural materials in their hands. I'd still purchase these again over soy crayon rocks or paraffin crayolas.
customer_reviews.author: H. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Not Even Close
customer_reviews.text: I unfortunately can't really comment on the crayons because while that's what I ordered and the packing slip said was in the box, that's not what I got. Instead of the crayons, the box contained a cheap looking stuffed seal. Since it was a Christmas present ordered a little too close to the deadline, there wasn't time to even attempt sending it back. I'm very disappointed with the seller. When even the packing slip agrees on what was ordered and supposedly shipped, it's pretty bad they shipped the wrong thing.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

product_meta.title: Stockmar 204884258 Waterproof Beeswax Blocks in Tin, 8 Blocks
product_meta.description: Tin of 8 standard colors: carmine red, orange, lemon yellow, green, blue, blue violet (purple), rust (brown), black The perfect set of the basic colors. These 8 radiant wax colors are unbeatable in terms of their special characteristics. Experience color in a unique way - one of their characteristic features is that they can be used both powerfully and transparently. Because of the pleasant smell of beeswax, they stimulate the child's senses during coloring. They meet the highest artistic and aesthetic demands. Elegant design with an attractive packaging and pleasant fragrance, STOCKMAR Wax Crayons appeal to the child's senses. How the colors shine and how versatile they are. Whether drawing, painting, generously applying, layering, scraping, and melting colors, STOCKMAR Wax Crayons promise years of pure drawing pleasure. Not overly creamy or too soft like other beeswax crayons. They fit well in the hand and are especially suited for small children. Children can draw colorful areas easily, and arrive at interesting effects. AP certified non-toxic. Internationally recognized for quality and safety for over 80 years. No synthetic pigments. Ingredients contain no: soy, egg, nuts, dairy, shellfish, wheat, GMOs
feature_bullets: With beeswax and non-toxic, light-fast colour pigments.
